ygData.subject: Re: Another Lament questio
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, the other lull spells work the same way but seem to have a (much) higher failure rate than Lament.  I m not sure about harmony, but that s outdoors
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 21 Jan 2000 Richardson.Paul@... wrote:
>
> > I have noticed that either one of two things will happen when a mob resists
> > the Lament song. Sometimes when you get the resist message the mob doesn't
> > aggro and remains where he is at. You can then reattempt to Lament them.
>
> I've noticed this too. Whenever it does, it's like winning the lottery. "Get
> ready for a fight, people! Oh wait...never mind. Lulled." I wonder if this
> happens with the lull spells of other classes?

Yes, the other lull spells work the same way but seem to have
a (much) higher failure rate than Lament. I'm not sure about
harmony, but that's outdoors only (my group with a L49 druid
made me Lament LDCs last night so we could get the stone
spider :).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
